title: Chapter I - GENERAL REGULATIONS OF THE SUPERINTENDENT
content:
Chapter I - GENERAL REGULATIONS OF THE SUPERINTENDENT
State Regulations

Part 50 - Mutual Trust Investment Companies

Part 105 - Repealed

Part 111 - Mutual Holding Companies (§ 111.1 to 111.8)

Part 113 - Repealed

Part 115 - Anti-money Laundering Programs For Applications For Charters, Acquisitions And Mergers And Changes Of Control (§ 115.1 to 115.4)

Part 116 - Maintenance Of Anti-money Laundering Compliance Programs By Banking Organizations And Foreign Banking Corporations Licensed To Maintain A Branch Or Agency (§ 116.1 to 116.3)

Part 117 - LENDING LIMITS: INCLUSION OF CREDIT EXPOSURES ARISING FROM DERIVATIVE TRANSACTIONS (§ 117.1 to 117.8)

Part 119 - Emergency Relief For New Yorkers Who Can Demonstrate Financial Hardship As A Result Of Covid-19 (§ 119.1 to 119.3)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
